conbody.p: If you have Analyzer Administration privileges, you can add SenSage AP data model categories to the Models Library. A data model category represents a grouping of models with a similar processing task.
To delete or add a data model category:

ol.li:
Go to the Analyzer dashboard, select the Administration menu on the left-hand side, and click Analytics from the dropdown submenu. The Analytics Administration screen is displayed as shown in Figure 11-1.
Figure 11-1: Analytics Administration Screen

To delete a category, select the checkbox of the category you want to delete. Click the - from the Edit Categories menu.
The Please Confirm dialog displays, click Yes.You can select mutiple categories and delete them together.
To add a new category, click the + button from the Edit Categories menu. A new item called "New Category" is added to the list. Double click on the new item and edit its name.
